name: One Perfect Day Demo
description:
One Perfect Day is a game that explores the topics of abuse and self-compassion. Encompassed in a first person puzzle adventure where players attempt to escape a time loop by solving non-linears puzzles in separate time periods with the use of chronological sequencing itself.

This was first made during the 48 hours Games Bagus Workshop Game Jam and has since been immensely worked on to become playable. 

Shoutout to narrative designer and artist Min Yee as well as programming wizard Yow En for the sleepless nights and hours to make this happen.

If you would like to spare some feedback, you can do so here as we're looking to develop a much bigger game that tackles the full breadth of the topic and story.
